sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Industrial&Enterprise Sys Eng department.
sectionNotes: Restricted to students with Senior class standing.
sectionText: Prerequisites: Basic knowledge of JAVA, SQL, Machine Learning, and Algorithms. This course will introduce students to data structures, algorithm design, complexity theory, and programming. Database design and query will also be covered. Programming assignments involving network optimization and decision making will be included.
